entry.title: 3M 497419 - Scotch Magic Tape, 810-212-C, 0.5 in x 36 Yd (12.7 mm x 33 m) 497419 7000126583
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 4.99

[shortdesc]

Scotch Magic Tape, 810-212-C, 0.5 in x 36 yd (12.7 mm x 33 m)

  • Scotch® Magic™ Tape is the original matte finish tape popular in countless homes, schools, and offices
  • Why? Because it works like magic – apply it and it disappears! Frosty on the roll but invisible on paper, this general-purpose tape is great for wrapping, sealing, or mending
  • It won’t show on notepads, documents, or craft paper, and you can even write on it with pen, pencil, or marker
  • This tape is also photo-safe so you can use it wherever you are – at home, in the classroom, or at the office.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Original matte-finish tape preferred in homes, schools and offices
  • Invisible when applied
  • Write on it with pen, pencil or marker
  • Photo-safe for colour photos
  • Glides off roll smoothly and cuts cleanly and easily
  • Resists moisture, yellowing and splitting
  • Tape comes in a box - no dispenser included
  • Includes two (2) Scotch® Magic™ Tapes per pack
    		•

entry.title: 3M 109-ESF - Scotch Removable Poster Tape, 109-Esf, 0.75 in x 150 in (1.91 cm x 3.81 m) 109-Esf 7100098023
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 4.31

[shortdesc]

Scotch Removable Poster Tape, 109-ESF, 0.75 in x 150 in (1.91 cm x 3.81 m)

  • Scotch® Removable Poster Tape is a general use packaging tape that is ideal for light to medium-duty packaging applications
  • The conformable film backing and hot melt adhesive assures reliable closures and is suitable for a wide range of uses, including temporary sealing applications
  • This poster tape rolls out smoothly and cuts easily thanks to its handy dispenser
  • Forget trying to create a sticky loop with one-sided tape and get a beautifully flush finish every time with Scotch® Removable Poster Tape.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Ideal for lightweight mounting like papers, photos, cards and more
  • Use instead of push pins to keep your surfaces looking great
  • Customize the length of your adhesive with the convenient dispenser
  • Easy-to-apply design with no mess or tools
  • Double-sided adhesive bonds on contact
  • Liner peels back to expose strong adhesive
  • Removes easily without leaving any residue
  • Great for use on metal, glass, mirrors, smooth wood, acrylic, plastic, painted walls and more
  • Not recommended for use on wallpaper, delicate surfaces or walls painted with flat paint
    		•
